data.eml:eml: A new record of Neoperla obliqua Banks, 1930 (Plecoptera: Perlidae) from Mt. Malindang, Mindanao, Philippines and association of life stages using DNA barcodes

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dela Cruz, Ian Niel B., Nuñeza, Olga M., Lin, Chung-Ping (2018): A new record of Neoperla obliqua Banks, 1930 (Plecoptera: Perlidae) from Mt. Malindang, Mindanao, Philippines and association of life stages using DNA barcodes. Zootaxa 4514 (1): 145-150, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4514.1.12
